item.title: Creating A Vector Graphics Version Of The Arrecibo Message
item.description: I recently remembered the very cool Arrecibo message and I discovered the Wikipedia article on it is truly fantastic. After reading about the meaning of all its parts of the message, I decided I wanted a printed copy for my home. In this post I describe how I generated the print-ready image file. Here is the message: Arrecibo Message. Image from Wikipedia by Arne Nordmann (norro), CC BY-SA 3.0,
